product.name: A-Premium Engine Valve Cover Compatible with Hyundai Accent 2012-2017 Veloster 2012-2017 Kia Forte Koup 2014-2016 Rio 2012-2017 Soul 2014-2018 1.6L Gas
product.description:
Compatible with Hyundai Models

Compatible with Kia Models
product.bullet_points:
• [Vehicle Fitment]: Compatible with Hyundai Accent 2012-2017 1.6L, Veloster 2012-2017 1.6L; Compatible with Kia Forte Koup 2014-2016 1.6L, Rio 2012-2017 1.6L, Soul 2014-2018 1.6L
• [Reference Part Number]: SK264007, 22410-2B611, 224102B611
• [Specification]: ① Material: Aluminum; ② Valve Cover Gasket Included: No; ③ Valve Cover Bolt Included: No; ④ Oil Filler Cap Included: No; ⑤ Replacement Type: Direct Replacement ( As Picture --- All accessories are pre-assembled into the valve cover to make it more convenient for you to replace car parts )
• [Professional Replacement]: This valve cover set (aka: "rocker cover" or "camshaft cover" or "rocker arm cover" ) made of durable material is the best professional solution for above models' engine problems and may help you resolve those problems: ① oil leaks (in the cover bottom or ignition coil hole) ② engine bay smoking ③ burning oil smell ④ misfiring engine ⑤ warning lights on the dashboard !!!!
• [Buy with Confidence]: A-Premium offers a one-year unlimited-mileage guarantee on our meticulously crafted valve cover kit. We offer a wide variety of automotive accessory categories, ensuring that you can hit the road with peace of mind.
